Hello, we have found that our swerve drive is incredibly jumpy and while we are looking for a solution, I thought I could ask here if anybody else has encountered this issue. Here is our code, we think there may be an issue with the slew rate, but we are not sure how to effectively add it. Thank youTeam code

WPILib has this explanation of PID that might be helpful for you. I also included a PID tuning guide from WPILib. If you have a software mentor, he/she will likely be able to help explain it. Introduction to PID ‚Äî FIRST Robotics Competition documentation
Testing and Tuning PID Loops ‚Äî FIRST Robotics Competition documentation


This part in your code is your PID values I think, unless you‚Äôre using them for something else?
